mapper.select: select s.member_id, so.s_times, sr.*, sra.s_attach_no, sra.s_review_no review_no, sra.s_review_original_filename, sra.s_review_renamed_filename, sra.s_review_created_at attach_created_at from subscription_review sr left join subscription_review_attachment sra on sr.s_review_no = sra.s_review_no join subscription_order so on sr.s_order_no = so.s_order_no join subscription s on so.s_no = s.s_no order by sr.s_review_created_at desc

select s.member_id, so.s_times, sr.*, sra.s_attach_no, sra.s_review_no review_no, sra.s_review_original_filename, sra.s_review_renamed_filename, sra.s_review_created_at attach_created_at from subscription_review sr left join subscription_review_attachment sra on sr.s_review_no = sra.s_review_no join subscription_order so on sr.s_order_no = so.s_order_no join subscription s on so.s_no = s.s_no where sr.s_review_no = #{sReviewNo}
